TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit MemoryStream extends System.IO.Stream

summary.span: Creates a stream whose backing store is memory.

span.span: Creates a stream whose backing store is memory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 流的当前位置是在其下一步读取或写入操作的位置可能发生的位置。The current position of a stream is the position at which the next read or write operation could take place. 可以检索当前的位置，或将其设置通过方法。The current position can be retrieved or set through the method. 新实例时创建的当前位置设置为零。When a new instance of is created, the current position is set to zero. [!INCLUDE[note_unnecessary_dispose](~/includes/note-unnecessary-dispose.md)] 创建与非无符号的字节数组的内存流提供非可调整大小的数据的流。Memory streams created with an unsigned byte array provide a non-resizable stream of the data. 在使用字节数组时，你不能将追加到或收缩流，尽管你可能能够修改的现有内容，具体取决于传递到构造函数的参数。When using a byte array, you can neither append to nor shrink the stream, although you might be able to modify the existing contents depending on the parameters passed into the constructor. 空内存流进行大小调整，和可以写入和读取。Empty memory streams are resizable, and can be written to and read from. 如果对象添加到 ResX 文件或.resources 文件，请调用方法在运行时来检索该值。If a object is added to a ResX file or a .resources file, call the method at runtime to retrieve it. 如果对象进行序列化到的资源文件，它实际上将序列化为。If a object is serialized to a resource file it will actually be serialized as an . 此行为提供更好的性能，以及能够直接，而无需经历获取指向数据的指针方法。This behavior provides better performance, as well as the ability to get a pointer to the data directly, without having to go through methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何读取和写入内存使用作为后备存储的数据。The following code example shows how to read and write data using memory as a backing store. [!code-cpp[System.IO.MemoryStream#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.MemoryStream/CPP/memstream.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.MemoryStream#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.MemoryStream/CS/memstream.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.MemoryStream#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.MemoryStream/VB/memstream.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和属性都设置为`true`。The , , and properties are all set to `true`. 设置为指定的字节数组的长度。 is set to the length of the specified byte array. 新的流可以写入，但不可调整大小。The new stream can be written to, but is not resizable. 流的长度不能设置为一个值大于指定的字节数组中; 的初始长度但是，可以截断流 (请参阅)。The length of the stream cannot be set to a value greater than the initial length of the specified byte array; however, the stream can be truncated (see ). 此构造函数不公开基础流。This constructor does not expose the underlying stream. 引发。 throws .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和属性都设置为`true`。The , , and properties are all set to `true`. 使用时将自动增加容量方法以将长度设置为值大于当前流的容量。The capacity automatically increases when you use the method to set the length to a value larger than the capacity of the current stream. 除`MemoryStream`使用 byte [] 参数构造的写入操作的末尾`MemoryStream`展开`MemoryStream`。Except for a `MemoryStream` constructed with a byte[] parameter, write operations at the end of a `MemoryStream` expand the `MemoryStream`. 此构造函数将公开基础流返回。This constructor exposes the underlying stream that returns. ## Examples 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks `Capacity` 是系统提供的字节数组的缓冲区长度。`Capacity` is the buffer length for system-provided byte arrays. `Capacity` 不能设置为小于当前流的长度的值。`Capacity` cannot be set to a value less than the current length of the stream. ## Examples 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. param.name: disposing
param.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the class and optionally releases the managed resources.

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the class and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共方法和方法。This method is called by the public method and the method. 调用受保护方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。 invokes the protected method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 方法。This method invokes the method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以多次调用由其他对象。在重写请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象。有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅 [实现释放 Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。有关详细信息和，请参阅 [清洗向上非托管 Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为写入到的任何数据对象写入到 RAM，此方法是冗余。Because any data written to a object is written into RAM, this method is redundant. 如果在完成之前，将取消该操作，返回的任务包含值属性。If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the value for the property. 你可以通过创建的实例创建一个取消标记类并传入属性作为`cancellationToken`参数。You can create a cancellation token by creating an instance of the class and passing the property as the `cancellationToken` parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，该缓冲区包含分配的字节数，这可能是未使用。Note that the buffer contains allocated bytes which might be unused. 例如，如果"test"的字符串写入到对象、 从返回的缓冲区的长度为 256，而不 4，其中有 252 个字节未使用。For example, if the string "test" is written into the object, the length of the buffer returned from is 256, not 4, with 252 bytes unused. 若要获取仅缓冲区中的数据，请使用方法; 但是，在内存中创建的数据副本。To obtain only the data in the buffer, use the method; however, creates a copy of the data in memory. 也可以是缓冲区`null`。The buffer can also be `null`. 若要创建`MemoryStream`使用公开可见的缓冲区，使用的实例， ，或。To create a `MemoryStream` instance with a publicly visible buffer, use , , or . 如果当前流已调整大小，两次调用此方法如果基础字节数组的大小调整调用之间不会返回相同的阵列。If the current stream is resizable, two calls to this method do not return the same array if the underlying byte array is resized between calls. 有关附加信息，请参见 。For additional information, see . > [!NOTE] > 当内存流已关闭时，此方法有效。This method works when the memory stream is closed.

exception.span: The instance was not created with a publicly visible buffer.

span.span: The instance was not created with a publicly visible buffer.

summary.span: Reads a block of bytes from the current stream and writes the data to a buffer.

span.span: Reads a block of bytes from the current stream and writes the data to a buffer.

returns.span: The total number of bytes written into the buffer.

span.span: The total number of bytes written into the buffer.

returns.span: This can be less than the number of bytes requested if that number of bytes are not currently available, or zero if the end of the stream is reached before any bytes are read.

span.span: This can be less than the number of bytes requested if that number of bytes are not currently available, or zero if the end of the stream is reached before any bytes are read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将替代。This method overrides . `offset`参数指定了中的第一个字节的偏移量`buffer`写入当前流中的数据到。The `offset` parameter gives the offset of the first byte in `buffer` to which data from the current stream is written. `count`参数提供的最大若要从当前流中读取的字节数。The `count` parameter gives the maximum number of bytes to read from the current stream. 如果已到达流结尾，则返回的值是实际数字节，则为零。The returned value is the actual number of bytes read, or zero if the end of the stream is reached. 如果读取的操作成功，流中的当前位置向前移动读取的字节数。If the read operation is successful, the current position within the stream advances by the number of bytes read. 如果发生异常，将流中的当前位置保持不变。If an exception occurs, the current position within the stream remains unchanged. `Read`方法将返回零，仅当已到达流结尾。The `Read` method will return zero only if the end of the stream is reached. 在所有其他情况下，`Read`始终至少 1 个字节从流中读取在返回之前。In all other cases, `Read` always reads at least one byte from the stream before returning. 根据定义，如果不会提供数据时调用流中`Read`、`Read`方法返回的零 （自动到达流结尾）。By definition, if no data is available from the stream upon a call to `Read`, the `Read` method returns zero (the end of the stream is reached automatically). 实现可以自由地返回少于所请求的字节，即使尚未达到流结尾。An implementation is free to return fewer bytes than requested even if the end of the stream has not been reached. 使用读取基元数据类型。Use for reading primitive data types. > [!CAUTION] > 如果在中指定的字节数组`buffer`参数是由基础缓冲区方法，将覆盖的数组内容，并不会引发异常。If the byte array specified in the `buffer` parameter is the underlying buffer returned by the method, the array contents are overwritten, and no exception is thrown. ## Examples 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.IO.MemoryStream#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.MemoryStream/CPP/memstream.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.MemoryStream#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.MemoryStream/CS/memstream.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.IO.MemoryStream#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.MemoryStream/VB/memstream.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将替代。This method overrides . 支持查找到流的长度超出任何位置。Seeking to any location beyond the length of the stream is supported. 不要使用方法，以确定流中的新位置，如果使用非零偏移量初始化的。Do not use the method to determine the new position in the stream if the was initialized with a non-zero offset. 如果这样做，将返回了不准确值。If you do, will return an inaccurate value. 请改用属性以获取流的新位置。Instead, use the property to get the new position of the stream. ## Examples 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将替代。This method overrides . 如果指定的值小于当前流的长度，则流将被截断。If the specified value is less than the current length of the stream, the stream is truncated. 如果截断后流中的当前位置是末尾的流，方法返回-1，方法读取到提供的字节数组中，零字节和和方法追加在流结尾，增加其长度的指定字节数。If after the truncation the current position within the stream is past the end of the stream, the method returns -1, the method reads zero bytes into the provided byte array, and and methods append specified bytes at the end of the stream, increasing its length. 如果指定的值大于当前容量并且流可进行调整，增加容量，并将流中的当前位置保持不变。If the specified value is larger than the current capacity and the stream is resizable, the capacity is increased, and the current position within the stream is unchanged. 如果长度增加，旧和新的长度之间流的内容将初始化为零。If the length is increased, the contents of the stream between the old and the new length are initialized to zeros. > [!NOTE] > A实例必须支持此方法可工作的写入。A instance must support writing for this method to work. 使用属性来确定当前实例是否支持写入。Use the property to determine whether the current instance supports writing. 有关附加信息，请参见 。For additional information, see .
